mapper.select: SELECT manualfile.*,manualdemand.demandListNo,manualdemand.applyTime,manualdemand.publishTime AS demandTime FROM service_engineering_maintenance_manualfile AS manualfile LEFT JOIN service_engineering_maintenance_manualfilelog AS manualfilelog ON manualfilelog.mainId = manualfile.id LEFT JOIN service_engineering_maintenance_manualdemand AS manualdemand ON manualfilelog.demandId = manualdemand.id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM service_engineering_maintenance_manualfile AS manualfile LEFT JOIN service_engineering_maintenance_manualfilelog AS manualfilelog ON manualfilelog.mainId = manualfile.id LEFT JOIN service_engineering_maintenance_manualdemand AS manualdemand ON manualfilelog.demandId = manualdemand.id
mapper.insert: insert into service_engineering_maintenance_manualfile( id, salesModel, designModel, materialCode, manualDescription, cpzgId, cpzgName, manualLanguage, manualCode, manualVersion, manualEdition, isCE, keyUserId, keyUser, publishTime, manualStatus, remark, CREATE_BY_, CREATE_TIME_ ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manualDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpzgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpzgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manualLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manualCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manualVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manualEdition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manualStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_BY_,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_TIME_,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update service_engineering_maintenance_manualfile set salesModel=#{salesModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, designModel=#{designModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materialCode=#{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manualDescription=#{manualDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpzgId=#{cpzgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpzgName=#{cpzgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manualLanguage=#{manualLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manualCode=#{manualCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manualVersion=#{manualVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manualEdition=#{manualEdition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isCE=#{isCE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyUserId=#{keyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyUser=#{keyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publishTime=#{publishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manualStatus=#{manualStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY_=#{UPDATE_BY_,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME_=#{UPDATE_TIME_,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT log.*, demand.demandListNo, demand.salesArea, demand.quantity, demand.applyTime, demand.publishTime, demand.applyUser, demand.applyDep, demand.Bconfirming FROM service_engineering_maintenance_manualfilelog AS log LEFT JOIN service_engineering_maintenance_manualdemand AS demand ON log.demandId = demand.id WHERE mainId = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into service_engineering_maintenance_manualfilelog( id, mainId, demandId, remark, CREATE_BY_, CREATE_TIME_ ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_BY_,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_TIME_,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT os_user.* FROM os_rel_inst LEFT JOIN os_group ON os_rel_inst.PARTY1_ = os_group.GROUP_ID_ LEFT JOIN os_user ON os_rel_inst.PARTY2_ = os_user.USER_ID_ WHERE os_rel_inst.DIM1_ = '2' AND os_group.KEY_ = #{roleKey}
